Item.Val_Named:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <data> <![CDATA[objDRs_ConfigItem = func_SoftwareDevelopment_Config.Select("Name_Token_ConfigItem='@Name_ConfigItem@'") If objDRs_ConfigItem.Length > 0 Then objDRC_Ref = procA_OR_Attribute_By_GUIDObjectReference.GetData(objDRs_ConfigItem(0).Item("GUID_ObjectReference")).Rows If objDRC_Ref.Count > 0 Then objSemItem_@Name_ConfigItem@.GUID = objDRC_Ref(0).Item("GUID_Attribute") objSemItem_@Name_ConfigItem@.Name = objDRC_Ref(0).Item("Name_Attribute") objSemItem_@Name_ConfigItem@.GUID_Parent = objDRC_Ref(0).Item("GUID_AttributeType") objSemItem_@Name_ConfigItem@.GUID_Type = objGlobals.ObjectReferenceType_Attribute.GUID Else Err.Raise(1, "Config not set") End If
Else Err.Raise(1, "Config not set") End If]]> </data>

Item.Val_Named:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?> <data> <![CDATA[objDRs_ConfigItem = func_SoftwareDevelopment_Config.Select("Name_Token_ConfigItem='@Name_ConfigItem@'") If objDRs_ConfigItem.Length > 0 Then objDRC_Ref = procA_OR_Type_By_GUID.GetData(objDRs_ConfigItem(0).Item("GUID_ObjectReference")).Rows If objDRC_Ref.Count > 0 Then objSemItem_@Name_ConfigItem@.GUID = objDRC_Ref(0).Item("GUID_Type") objSemItem_@Name_ConfigItem@.Name = objDRC_Ref(0).Item("Name_Type") If Not IsDBNull(objDRC_Ref(0).Item("GUID_Type_Parent")) Then objSemItem_@Name_ConfigItem@.GUID_Parent = objDRC_Ref(0).Item("GUID_Type_Parent") End If objSemItem_@Name_ConfigItem@.GUID_Type = objGlobals.ObjectReferenceType_Type.GUID Else Err.Raise(1, "Config not set") End If
Else Err.Raise(1, "Config not set") End If]]> </data>
